AboutCompanyNameParagraph: Sara Akerman Attorney at law provides services in all areas of commercial, civil, labor and administrative law. With our team of professional, dedicated and capable associates, we provide legal assistance to business entities in the Republic of Serbia, legal assistance to individuals in the problems they face every day. We are constantly working on improving the quality and way of providing our services.
AboutAreasParagraph: Akerman Law office can offer you tailor-made advice solutions to various queries. We provide legal support in a wide range of legal areas.
